```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(dplyr)
library(skimr)

us_tilapia_imports <- read_csv(here::here("data", "us_tilapia_imports.csv"))
```

```{r}
summary(us_tilapia_imports)
names(us_tilapia_imports)
dim(us_tilapia_imports)
skim(us_tilapia_imports)

us_tilapia_imports <- us_tilapia_imports %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = `1992`:`2018`,
    names_to = "year",
    values_to = "tilapia_imports"
  )

class(us_tilapia_imports$year)
us_tilapia_imports <- us_tilapia_imports %>%
  mutate(year = as.numeric(year))

yearly_tilapia_tot <- us_tilapia_imports %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarize(total_imports = sum(tilapia_imports, na.rm = TRUE))

ggplot(data = yearly_tilapia_tot, aes(x = year, y = total_imports)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(title = "US Tilapia Imports (1992â€“2018)",
       x = "Year",
       y = "Total Imports")

ggsave(width = 8, height = 6, here::here("figs", "yearly_tilapia_tot.png"))

us_csa_imports <- us_tilapia_imports |>
  filter(country %in% c("Ecuador", "Honduras", "Costa Rica", "Mexico"))

ggplot(data = us_csa_imports, aes(x = year, y = tilapia_imports)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = country))

ggsave(width = 8, height = 6, here::here("figs", "us_csa_imports.jpg"))

```
